meanings.definition: The action of going beyond what is allowed or expected.
meanings.sent1: Her exceedance of the speed limit resulted in a ticket.
meanings.sent2: The exceedance of the budget led to financial issues.
meanings.sent3: His constant exceedance of the rules made him the class clown.
meanings.sent4: The team's exceedance of expectations shocked everyone.
meanings.sent5: The exceedance of the noise level made it impossible to concentrate.

meanings.definition: The amount by which something exceeds a limit or threshold.
meanings.sent1: The rainfall exceedance caused flooding in the area.
meanings.sent2: The exceedance of sugar in the recipe made it too sweet.
meanings.sent3: The exceedance of guests at the party made it a huge success.
meanings.sent4: The exceedance of goals set a new record for the team.
meanings.sent5: The exceedance of speed on the highway was dangerous.
